item.title: Drafting Batters in Fantasy Baseball, Part 1
item.description: My first season in fantasy baseball What is fantasy baseball? The draft How I prepared for the draft My draft strategy Up next My first season in fantasy baseball I joined a fantasy baseball league for the first time this year, which may come as a shock to those of you who know that I love both baseball and data. I was in a fantasy basketball league a few years ago, but because I havenâ€™t watched basketball seriously in about 15 years, these were two very unsatisfying seasons.
